# Whats91

> Enterprise WhatsApp Cloud API Platform - Official Meta Business Solution Provider for India. Transform business communication with 500+ msgs/sec throughput, 99.9% uptime, and seamless ERP integrations.

## Core Services

- [WhatsApp Cloud API Integration](/solutions/busy-erp) - Complete enterprise messaging solution with official Meta partnership
- [Busy Accounting Integration](/solutions/busy-erp) - Automated invoice delivery, payment reminders, and 24/7 chatbot for Busy ERP
- [WhatsApp Business Templates](/whatsapp-templates) - 20+ pre-approved message templates for marketing, utility, and authentication
- [WhatsApp Coexistence Guide](/whatsapp-coexistence) - Strategic implementation for microbusinesses using both App and Cloud API

## Free Tools

- [WhatsApp Link Generator](/tools/whatsapp-link-generator) - Generate wa.me links with pre-filled messages
- [QR Code Generator](/tools/qr-code-generator) - Create QR codes for URLs, vCards, WiFi, and more
- [WhatsApp API Cost Calculator](/tools/whatsapp-api-cost-calculator) - Calculate messaging costs by country and category
- [GST Calculator](/tools/gst-calculator) - Indian GST computation tool
- [SIP Calculator](/tools/sip-calculator) - Systematic Investment Plan returns calculator
- [Image Compressor](/tools/image-compressor) - Client-side image optimization
- [SEO Score Checker](/tools/seo-checker) - Analyze webpage SEO performance
- [Case Converter](/tools/case-converter) - Text case transformation utility

## Documentation & Resources

- [API Documentation](/solutions/busy-api) - WhatsApp Cloud API integration guides
- [Blog](/blog) - Technical articles on WhatsApp API, ERP integrations, and automation
- [Pricing](/pricing) - Transparent pricing for WhatsApp Business API services

## Key Entities

- **Organization**: Wilford Technology (Parent Company)
- **Platform**: Whats91
- **Primary Market**: India
- **Technology Stack**: Next.js, TypeScript, WhatsApp Cloud API, Prisma
- **Industry**: Business Communication, Enterprise Messaging, ERP Integration

## Integrations

- Busy Accounting Software
- Tally ERP (Coming Soon)
- Zoho CRM (Coming Soon)
- Custom REST APIs

## Compliance

- GDPR Compliant
- ISO 27001 Certified Infrastructure
- Meta Business Solution Provider
- Data Localization: India
